parquet.thrift

Class ThriftRecordConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • parquet.io.api.RecordMaterializer<T>
      • parquet.thrift.ThriftRecordConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScroogeRecordConverter, TBaseRecordConverter

    public class ThriftRecordConverter<T>
extends RecordMaterializer<T>
    converts the columnar events into a Thrift protocol.
    Author:
    Julien Le Dem

      • ThriftRecordConverter

        public ThriftRecordConverter(ThriftReader<T> thriftReader,
                     String name,
                     MessageType parquetSchema,
                     ThriftType.StructType thriftType)
        Parameters:
        thriftReader - the class responsible for instantiating the final object and read from the protocol
        name - the name of that type ( the thrift class simple name)
        parquetSchema - the schema for the incoming columnar events
        thriftType - the thrift type descriptor
